title: Executive Order 12679-Level IV of the Executive Schedule
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and laws of the United States of America, including section 5317 of title 5 of the United States Code, and in order to place an additional position in level IV of the Executive Schedule, section I-101 of Executive Order No. 12154, as amended, is hereby further amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:
"(g) Assistant Secretary of the Air Force (1)."

George Bush
The White House,
June 23, 1989.
citation: George Bush, Executive Order 12679-Level IV of the Executive Schedule Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/269100
